description: Erection of single storey garden outbuilding (gym) to rear
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used as ancillary to the main house and shall not be converted into a separate dwelling without the grant of further specific planning permission from the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To safeguard the primary use on the site and to prevent the intensification of the site

The Council's Highways Officer and Environmental Protection Officer are satisfied with the information provided for Condition 26 of planning permission 20/01024/FUL. As such, this condition is hereby approved.

The proposed site is categorised as a flat, the submitted appliction form has ownership certificate A, please confirm the ownership certificate A is correct or please submit the correct ownership certificate.
